title: Chogath Top Thoughts?
body: Pretty sure Cho is broken. Grasp + rod of ages + iceborn into tank build crushes every lane. 1st pick every game.

replies.body: I agree, I have seen Professional oceanic eboy Pabu destroy pacman with cho'gath top more times than pacman has failed diamond promos. I wake up in a cold sweat everynight because of pacmans 0/10 thunderlords jungle cho'gath
Yeah, I agree with Chogath top lane.

I think he's a garbage champion, not because he's bad in lane (because he's actually fairly dominant), but because late game he'd get kited the fuck out of. In a meta where Vayne and Jhin are commonplace, as well as Syndra, Ryze and LB I don't see what he'd do past 15 minutes.
Pac plz, we have been through this, don't bring it up again
Cho'gath top's viability is only diminished by his strength in the jungle. IMO right up there with gangplank and nasus jungle.
Cho is the king of top lane. If i don't see it once from you this split i will be severely disappointed.
